Package com.game.main

Class Projectile

java.lang.Object
com.game.main.Projectile
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable, Runnable
public class Projectile extends Object implements Runnable, Drawable
Defines a round projectile, moving in a straight line.

    • isHitTarget

      public boolean isHitTarget()
      Returns whether the projectile has hit a target or not.

      Returns:
      True if the projectile has hit a target or its lifetime has expired, otherwise false.

    • getSize
